bibl.title: Interpreting a Classic. Demosthenes and his Ancient Commentators.
bibl.note: Preface. - Abbreviations. - Introduction. - Part One. The Ancient Commentaries on Demosthenes. - Part Two. Texts, Translations, and Notes: 1. Commentary on Dem. 9-11 and 13 (P. Berol. Inv. 9780 [= Pack2 339]); - 2. Didymus fragments in Harpocration; - 3. Lexicon to Dem. 23 (P. Berol. Inv. 5008 [= Pack2 317]); - 4. Commentary on Dem. 5 (P. Berol. Inv. 21188 = B.K.T. IX, 91); - 5. Commentary on Dem. 22 (P. Stras. Inv. 84 [= Pack2 310]); - 6. Lexicon to Dem. 21 (P. Rainer inv. 7 [= Pack2 308]). - Appendix: Rhetorical Prologue and Commentary on Dem. 21 (P. lit. Lond. 179 [= Pack2 307]). - Bibliography. - Indices.

bibl.title: Douglas M. Macdowell
bibl.note: Douglas M. Macdowell, CR N.S., 53 (2003) pp. 303-304.
